messages.messageBody:
wow karen,

lots of good stuff here i was not aware of!

thanks for sharing these links!!

kelli

messages.subject: Good Sources for Evolution/Intel Design (was Good Sources for Evolution...)
messages.msgSnippet: Here are starting resources for both sides of the evolution/intelligent design debate.  Regardless of what one believes about this debate, reviewing materials
messages.messageBody:
Here are starting resources for both sides of the evolution/intelligent design debate. Regardless of what one believes about this debate, reviewing materials from both sides is an opportunity for our kids (and/or us) to:

(1) practice critical thinking skills by analyzing both sides of a debate
(2) learn more about science, cosmology, biology, micro-biology, and how scientific observations are evaluated
(3) learn more about the philosophy and definitions of science
(4) learn more about a current debate (going beyond the few sound bites offered in news-analysis shows) with potentially big consequences in terms of world views

Karen

Pro Macro-evolution Sources




Books:



On the Origin of Species , by Charles Darwin



Evolution vs. Creationism: An Introduction, by Eugenie Scott



The Selfish Gene, by Richard Dawkins



The Blind Watchmaker by Richard Dawkins



Science and Earth History by Arthur Strahler

Scientists Confront Creationism, edited by L. Godfrey

Abusing Science by Philip Kitcher





Journal:



�Nature




Articles:



November 2004 Nation Geographic issue
on Evolution



"Evolution and Creationism: A Guide for Museum Docents"

www.priweb.org/Evolution%20and%20Creationism.pdf





Websites:



www.talkorgins.org



www.pandasthumb.org







Pro Intelligent Design, Pro Creation, or Anti Macro-evolution Sources




Books:



Darwin�s Black Box, by Michael Behe



Design Revolution: Answering the Toughest Questions About Intelligent Design , by William Dembski



Icons of Evolution, by Jonathan Wells



Darwin on Trial, by Phillip Johnson



Design Inference, by William Dembski



Not by Chance: Shattering the Modern Theory of Evolution by Lee Spetner





Articles:



�Intelligent Design is not Creationism�

http://www.discovery.org/scripts/viewDB/index.php?command=view&id=3191



Response to November 2004 Nation Geographic issue
on Evolution

http://www.apologeticspress.org/pdfs/ng_darwin.pdf



Response regarding The Blind Watchmaker

http://www.arn.org/docs/johnson/cre_bw98.htm





Websites:



http://www.trueorigin.org/



News and analysis

http://www.creationsafaris.com/crevnews.htm





Videos:

Clips from The Case for a Creator

http://www.leestrobel.com/CFCreator.htm
